<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_hub_flow"> <sys_hub_flow action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <acls/> <active>false</active> <annotation/> <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>Translate text to multiple languages using Microsoft Azure Translator Service.</p> <p> <b>Inputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>Text</strong> - Text to be translated.
</li> <li> <strong>Target Languages</strong> - JSON string containing an array of language codes to which the text needs to be translated. Ex: ['fr','it']
</li> <li> <strong>Source Language</strong> - Source language code of the text. Ex: en
</li> <li> <strong>Additional Parameters</strong> - JSON string containing additional context parameters. Supported parameter is textType and its value should be html or plain.
<ul> <br/> Ex: [{'parameter_name': 'textType', 'parameter_value': 'html'}]. </ul> </li> </ul> <p> <b>Outputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>Translations</strong> - JSON string containing texts translated to the given target languages.
<ul> <br/> Sample translations response
<br/>[
<br/>{'target_language':'fr', 'translated_text':'Bonjour'},
<br/>{'target_language':'it', 'translated_text':'ciao'}
<br/>]
</ul> </li> <li> <strong>Detected Language</strong> - Language code detected by Microsoft Azure Translator Service for the given text. Returned only if source language code is not populated in input.
</li> <li> <strong>Status</strong> - 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Code</strong> - Code for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> </ul> <p> <b>Error Codes - Error Messages:</b> </p> <ul> <li>40052 - Text ('text' field) has exceeded its maximum length.</li> <li>40053 - Source language is invalid</li> <li>40054 - Target language is invalid.</li> <li>40055 - Request is not authorized because credentials are missing or invalid.</li> <li>40056 - Text cannot be translated to target languages.</li> <li>40050 - Error code to populate error messages from Microsoft Translator instead of standardized error messages.</li> <li>40051 - Unknown error occurred.</li> </ul>
<p>To use this subflow, a corresponding Microsoft Azure Translator Service connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Translation Connection & Credential alias. <a target="_blank" href="/api/now/v1/context_doc_url/Microsoft_Azure_Translator_Service_Spoke">Learn More</a></p> </description> <internal_name>translate_text_to_multiple_languages</internal_name> action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <acls/> <active>true</active> <annotation/> <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>Translate text to multiple languages using Microsoft Azure Translator Service.</p> <p> <b>Inputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>Text</strong> - Text to be translated.
</li> <li> <strong>Target Languages</strong> - JSON string containing an array of language codes to which the text needs to be translated. Ex: ['fr','it']
</li> <li> <strong>Source Language</strong> - Source language code of the text. Ex: en
</li> <li> <strong>Additional Parameters</strong> - JSON string containing additional context parameters. Supported parameter is textType and its value should be html or plain.
<ul> <br/> Ex: [{'parameter_name': 'textType', 'parameter_value': 'html'}]. </ul> </li> </ul> <p> <b>Outputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>Translations</strong> - JSON string containing texts translated to the given target languages.
<ul> <br/> Sample translations response
<br/>[
<br/>{'target_language':'fr', 'translated_text':'Bonjour'},
<br/>{'target_language':'it', 'translated_text':'ciao'}
<br/>]
</ul> </li> <li> <strong>Detected Language</strong> - Language code detected by Microsoft Azure Translator Service for the given text. Returned only if source language code is not populated in input.
</li> <li> <strong>Status</strong> - 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Code</strong> - Code for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> </ul> <p> <b>Error Codes - Error Messages:</b> </p> <ul> <li>40052 - Text ('text' field) has exceeded its maximum length.</li> <li>40053 - Source language is invalid</li> <li>40054 - Target language is invalid.</li> <li>40055 - Request is not authorized because credentials are missing or invalid.</li> <li>40056 - Text cannot be translated to target languages.</li> <li>40050 - Error code to populate error messages from Microsoft Translator instead of standardized error messages.</li> <li>40051 - Unknown error occurred.</li> </ul>
<p>To use this subflow, a corresponding Microsoft Azure Translator Service connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Translation Connection & Credential alias. <a target="_blank" href="/api/now/v1/context_doc_url/Microsoft_Azure_Translator_Service_Spoke">Learn More</a></p> </description> <internal_name>translate_text_to_multiple_languages</internal_name>
